about_the_game:
"Assemble! Animal Pals" is the first DLC for Cluckmech Oasis, featuring a brand-new Scene, a variety of new characters, new enemies, and new cluckmech.

 

Exhausted from countless time-traveling missions to save the world, the Warcluck sees a convoy of new mobile base appear on the horizon, a beacon of hope cutting through the sky. The Animal Pals, once united on their long journey, now gather to embark on this grand quest to save the world!

 

 

5 New Characters (Including 1 Main Character and 4 Animal Pals)

 

  • Hungrygator

A renowned explorer and gourmet, famous for devouring cluckmechs to enhance itself. As a seasoned adventurer, it expertly masters various special cluckmechs, its half-closed eyes radiating an air of mystery.

Four brand-new Initial Talent offer radically different gameplay!

Whether it's building an impenetrable defense, strengthening it's own power, or mastering the cooldown control of cluckmechs, each choice leads to an unparalleled adventure journey!

 

The Animal Pals each have unique gameplay and abilities, using their specialized skills to assist the Animal Crusaders !

 

  • GooseQin - A walking speaker, it loves to honk loudly. Dreaming of becoming a top cluckmech trainer, it embarks on this extraordinary journey not alone, but with its loyal gorilla companion by its side.

  • BunnyHachi - The undisputed star of the swamp, it can summon countless fervent followers anytime, anywhere, with its irresistible charm! Its love for Canned Fish Mint is not just a delight for the taste buds, but also a source of great power.

  • Gascoon - The Scavenger Master, turning low-tier cluckmechs into massive powerhouses; a free spirit, its homemade weapons pack an incredible punch.

  • Jelly Knight - Defense is Offense, A powerful all-in-one mech that can enhance itself with cluckmechs. The jellyfish's exclusive swordsmanship effortlessly slices through plants

In-game Talent fully upgraded, with new combinations changing gameplay!

 

 

  • Over 20 new cluckmechs & 50+ new Enhances!

Introducing the new 'Devour' and 'Hunger' series cluckmechs, delivering unprecedented shock and disruptive changes to the battlefield. The secret black-tech creations by the Engineering Lion team are finally unveiled!

 

 

  • New Exploration Area - Crystal Cavern

In their long battle against plant enemies, the animals sought to carve a secret tunnel underground. However, they overlooked one fact: that dark world is not only the mole family's ancestral land, but also a kingdom silently claimed by the plants' roots...

 

 

  • Numerous new enemies & bosses

New enemies incoming! The ground trembles as mutated peanuts go wild. Turnip race on the minecart, and missile beets are already launched, heading your way!

 

 

  • New gameplay

  • New music tracks

  • New achievements

  • And more!!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11
  • Processor: M1 or Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 13
  • Processor: M1 or Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

movies.name: 《鸡械绿洲 - 集结！动物伙伴》定档PV（EN）

name: Cluckmech Oasis - Assemble! Animal Pals

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Dual Core+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-12100
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The call to assemble! 5 unique characters with 20+ new cluckmechs join the Crusaders. Explore new areas-Caven, build defenses, and defeat the plant enemies!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
